alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 7:54PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills between 35 and 45 below zero. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
